metadata.title: Security & Privacy Personas Collection
metadata.description: A comprehensive collection of 128 personas from security and privacy literature
metadata.source: Systematic Literature Review: What Do Personas Say About Privacy & Security
categories: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users

matthews2019black.title: Black hat trolling, white hat trolling, and hacking the attention landscape

bhattarai2016information.title: Information security application design: understanding your users

liang2015papdroid.title: PAPDroid: Personalization Awareness Privacy Protection in Android

tariq2012framing.title: Framing the attacker in organized cybercrime

tretow2023prototyping.title: Prototyping the Learning Analytics Dashboards of an Adaptive Learning Platform: Faculty Perceptions Versus Designers' Intentions

wodo2020security.title: Security of Digital Banking Systems in Poland: Users Study 2019

personas.name: Black Hat Troll
personas.description: Malicious troll with harmful motivations and hacking methods targeting media and political platforms
personas.fullCitation: Matthews, John. 'Black hat trolling, white hat trolling, and hacking the attention landscape.' 2019.

personas.name: Gray Hat Troll
personas.description: Troll with mixed motivations and moderate harmful behaviors in online spaces
personas.fullCitation: Matthews, John. 'Black hat trolling, white hat trolling, and hacking the attention landscape.' 2019.

personas.name: White Hat Troll
personas.description: Troll with defensive or educational motivations, using disruption for positive purposes
personas.fullCitation: Matthews, John. 'Black hat trolling, white hat trolling, and hacking the attention landscape.' 2019.

personas.name: Security Team
personas.description: Professional security team member in organizational context responsible for threat assessment
personas.context: Understanding needs of security applications users
personas.fullCitation: Bhattarai, Suraj. 'Information security application design: understanding your users.' 2016.

personas.name: IT Team
personas.description: IT professional with technical system responsibilities and infrastructure management
personas.context: Understanding needs of security applications users
personas.fullCitation: Bhattarai, Suraj. 'Information security application design: understanding your users.' 2016.

personas.name: Policy Team
personas.description: Policy-focused professional handling security governance and compliance

personas.fullCitation: Bhattarai, Suraj. 'Information security application design: understanding your users.' 2016.

personas.name: Security Reseller
personas.description: Commercial security solution provider focused on sales and implementation
personas.context: Understanding needs of security applications users
personas.fullCitation: Bhattarai, Suraj. 'Information security application design: understanding your users.' 2016.

personas.name: Ideologically Motivated Attacker (Martin)
personas.description: Attacker driven by ideological beliefs and political motivations with sophisticated techniques
personas.fullCitation: Tariq, Muhammad. 'Framing the attacker in organized cybercrime.' 2012.

personas.name: Botnet Developer (Thomas)
personas.description: Technical specialist focused on botnet creation and management for criminal purposes
personas.fullCitation: Tariq, Muhammad. 'Framing the attacker in organized cybercrime.' 2012.

personas.name: Bragger
personas.description: Attacker motivated by recognition and reputation within hacker communities
personas.fullCitation: Tariq, Muhammad. 'Framing the attacker in organized cybercrime.' 2012.

personas.name: Insider
personas.description: Internal threat actor with privileged access and organizational knowledge
personas.fullCitation: Tariq, Muhammad. 'Framing the attacker in organized cybercrime.' 2012.

personas.name: Spy
personas.description: Intelligence-gathering focused threat actor with espionage capabilities
personas.fullCitation: Tariq, Muhammad. 'Framing the attacker in organized cybercrime.' 2012.

personas.name: Financially Motivated Attacker (Kevin)
personas.description: Profit-driven cybercriminal with financial objectives and monetary focus
personas.fullCitation: Tariq, Muhammad. 'Framing the attacker in organized cybercrime.' 2012.

personas.name: Alina Action (Proactive Teacher)
personas.description: Proactive educator focused on clear learning mechanics and student engagement
personas.fullCitation: Tretow, Anna. 'Prototyping the Learning Analytics Dashboards of an Adaptive Learning Platform: Faculty Perceptions Versus Designers' Intentions.' 2023.

personas.name: Paul Privacy (Privacy-Conscious Teacher)
personas.description: Privacy-focused educator concerned with data protection and student privacy
personas.fullCitation: Tretow, Anna. 'Prototyping the Learning Analytics Dashboards of an Adaptive Learning Platform: Faculty Perceptions Versus Designers' Intentions.' 2023.

personas.name: Niels Novice (Data-Driven Teacher)
personas.description: Novice teacher interested in data-driven instruction and learning analytics
personas.fullCitation: Tretow, Anna. 'Prototyping the Learning Analytics Dashboards of an Adaptive Learning Platform: Faculty Perceptions Versus Designers' Intentions.' 2023.

personas.name: Naive Nadia (Unconcerned Banking User)
personas.description: Banking user with low security awareness and concern, representing 45% of users
personas.fullCitation: Wodo, Wojciech. 'Security of Digital Banking Systems in Poland: Users Study 2019.' 2020.

personas.name: Fearful Frank (Distrustful User)
personas.description: Highly distrustful banking user with security fears, representing 10% of users
personas.fullCitation: Wodo, Wojciech. 'Security of Digital Banking Systems in Poland: Users Study 2019.' 2020.

personas.name: Reasonable Rick (Balanced User)
personas.description: Balanced banking user with moderate security approach, representing 45% of users
personas.fullCitation: Wodo, Wojciech. 'Security of Digital Banking Systems in Poland: Users Study 2019.' 2020.

personas.name: Corrupt Software Developer
personas.description: Insider threat in software development with malicious intent and system access
personas.fullCitation: Steele, Robert. 'Adversary Centered Design: Threat Modeling Using Anti-Scenarios, Anti-Use Cases and Anti-Personas.' 2008.

personas.name: Social Activist
personas.description: Politically motivated individual targeting election systems for ideological purposes
personas.fullCitation: Steele, Robert. 'Adversary Centered Design: Threat Modeling Using Anti-Scenarios, Anti-Use Cases and Anti-Personas.' 2008.

personas.name: Professional Hacker
personas.description: Skilled technical threat actor with advanced capabilities and systematic approach
personas.fullCitation: Steele, Robert. 'Adversary Centered Design: Threat Modeling Using Anti-Scenarios, Anti-Use Cases and Anti-Personas.' 2008.

personas.name: Ben (Experienced Penetration Tester)
personas.description: Senior security professional with extensive testing experience and advanced skills
personas.fullCitation: Faily, Shamal. 'Visualising personas as goal models to find security tensions.' 2021.

personas.name: Alex (Junior Security Engineer)
personas.description: Entry-level security professional learning the field with basic skills
personas.fullCitation: Faily, Shamal. 'Visualising personas as goal models to find security tensions.' 2021.

personas.name: George (IT Manager)
personas.description: IT management professional overseeing security operations and team coordination
personas.fullCitation: Faily, Shamal. 'Visualising personas as goal models to find security tensions.' 2021.

personas.name: Rick (Plant Operator)
personas.description: Industrial control systems operator with security responsibilities in critical infrastructure
personas.fullCitation: Faily, Shamal. 'Visualising personas as goal models to find security tensions.' 2021.

personas.name: Scott Young (Tech-Savvy Student)
personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users
personas.description: Technically proficient student with high technology adoption and digital native behavior
personas.fullCitation: Bowles, John. 'The personification of reliability, safety, and security.' 2007.

personas.name: Helen Davis (Elderly Novice User)
personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users
personas.description: Senior user with limited technical experience and support needs for basic computing
personas.fullCitation: Bowles, John. 'The personification of reliability, safety, and security.' 2007.

personas.name: Robert McGinnis (Online Shopper)
personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users
personas.description: E-commerce focused user with online purchasing behaviors and payment security concerns
personas.fullCitation: Bowles, John. 'The personification of reliability, safety, and security.' 2007.

personas.name: Mark (Marginally Aware)
personas.description: User with low knowledge and low motivation for security practices
personas.context: Privacy and security tool user identification
personas.fullCitation: Dupree, Jennifer. 'A case study of using grounded analysis as a requirement engineering method: Identifying personas that specify privacy and security tool users.' 2018.

personas.name: Robert (Fundamentalist)
personas.description: User with strong security beliefs and rigid practices following strict protocols
personas.context: Privacy and security tool user identification
personas.fullCitation: Dupree, Jennifer. 'A case study of using grounded analysis as a requirement engineering method: Identifying personas that specify privacy and security tool users.' 2018.

personas.name: Allison (Struggling Amateur)
personas.description: User attempting security practices but struggling with implementation and understanding
personas.context: Privacy and security tool user identification
personas.fullCitation: Dupree, Jennifer. 'A case study of using grounded analysis as a requirement engineering method: Identifying personas that specify privacy and security tool users.' 2018.

personas.name: Patricia (Technician)
personas.description: Technically competent user with systematic security approach and methodical practices
personas.context: Privacy and security tool user identification
personas.fullCitation: Dupree, Jennifer. 'A case study of using grounded analysis as a requirement engineering method: Identifying personas that specify privacy and security tool users.' 2018.

personas.name: Henry (Lazy Expert)
personas.description: Highly knowledgeable user with low motivation to implement security measures
personas.context: Privacy and security tool user identification
personas.fullCitation: Dupree, Jennifer. 'A case study of using grounded analysis as a requirement engineering method: Identifying personas that specify privacy and security tool users.' 2018.

personas.name: Outgoing Connector
personas.description: Social media user focused on building connections and expanding networks
personas.fullCitation: Dang, Thy. 'Demystifying online personas of Vietnamese young adults on Facebook: A Q-methodology approach.' 2015.

personas.name: Reserved Trustor
personas.description: Cautious social media user with selective sharing patterns and privacy awareness
personas.fullCitation: Dang, Thy. 'Demystifying online personas of Vietnamese young adults on Facebook: A Q-methodology approach.' 2015.

personas.name: Threats Perceiver
personas.description: Security-conscious user with high threat awareness and protective behaviors
personas.fullCitation: Dang, Thy. 'Demystifying online personas of Vietnamese young adults on Facebook: A Q-methodology approach.' 2015.

personas.name: Lina Odinsson (E-sports Celebrity)
personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users
personas.description: High-profile gaming personality with public exposure concerns and privacy challenges
personas.fullCitation: Toresson, Lars. 'PISA: a privacy impact self-assessment app using personas to relate app behavior to risks to smartphone users.' 2020.

personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users
personas.description: Senior citizen with traditional privacy expectations and limited digital literacy

personas.description: Gaming-focused user developing cybersecurity awareness through interactive learning

personas.description: Administrative support role with limited technical background but system access

personas.name: Gabriele (CFO)

personas.name: Hans (Head of IT)

personas.name: Information Security Officer
personas.description: Dedicated security professional managing organizational risk and security policies

personas.fullCitation: Schufrin, Mark. 'Visual firewall log analysis-at the border between analytical and appealing.' 2022.

personas.name: Network Analyst
personas.description: Technical professional analyzing network security patterns and traffic monitoring

personas.fullCitation: Schufrin, Mark. 'Visual firewall log analysis-at the border between analytical and appealing.' 2022.

personas.name: Frank Kreuse (Cyber Analyst)
personas.description: Cybersecurity analysis specialist with threat intelligence focus and analytical skills
personas.fullCitation: Stoll, John. 'Adapting personas for use in security visualization design.' 2008.

personas.name: Terry Whitter (Intelligence Specialist)
personas.description: Intelligence analysis professional with strategic security view and information processing

personas.name: Rob McCormick (Safety Officer)
personas.description: Safety-focused professional with operational security concerns and risk management

personas.name: Peter (Tech-Savvy User)
personas.description: Technically proficient user with privacy awareness and security consciousness
personas.fullCitation: Paske, Michael. 'Follow you follow me: Using location tracking to mitigate multi-device privacy threats.' 2012.

personas.name: David (Car Access Exploiter)
personas.description: Malicious actor targeting automotive systems with exploitation capabilities
personas.fullCitation: Paske, Michael. 'Follow you follow me: Using location tracking to mitigate multi-device privacy threats.' 2012.

personas.name: Frankie (Mischief Maker)
personas.description: Playful threat actor with disruptive but non-malicious intent and curiosity-driven behavior
personas.fullCitation: Paske, Michael. 'Follow you follow me: Using location tracking to mitigate multi-device privacy threats.' 2012.

personas.name: Justin (Privacy-Unaware User)
personas.description: User with low privacy awareness freely sharing location data without consideration
personas.fullCitation: Paske, Michael. 'Follow you follow me: Using location tracking to mitigate multi-device privacy threats.' 2012.

personas.name: Logan (White British 8-year-old boy with no siblings)
personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users

personas.fullCitation: Dempsey, Sarah. 'Children designing privacy warnings: Informing a set of design guidelines.' 2022.

personas.description: Pre-teen with diverse background and sibling interactions affecting privacy behavior

personas.name: Nauman (Unrestricted)
personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users

personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users

personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users

personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users

personas.fullCitation: Mustafa, Mariam. 'Pakistani Teens and Privacy-How Gender Disparities, Religion and Family Values Impact the Privacy Design Space.' 2023.

personas.name: Ken Wayne (InfoSec Consultant)
personas.description: Information security consulting professional with expertise in security design and communication

personas.name: Mobile User (WiFi Leakage Concern)
personas.description: Mobile device user concerned about WiFi data leakage and application gossip

personas.name: Privacy-Conscious Individual
personas.description: Individual with high privacy awareness using threat modeling approaches

personas.fullCitation: Dev, Harsh. 'Models of applied privacy (MAP): A persona based approach to threat modeling.' 2023.

personas.name: Recommendation System User
personas.description: User of privacy-preserving collaborative recommender systems with popularity bias concerns
personas.fullCitation: Gulsoy, Berrin. 'Robustness of privacy-preserving collaborative recommenders against popularity bias problem.' 2023.

personas.name: Healthcare Provider
personas.description: Medical professional using clinical decision support systems with security concerns
personas.context: Clinical decision support systems threat analysis
personas.fullCitation: Hamel, Laurent. 'Safeguarding Healthcare: A Comprehensive Threat Analysis of Clinical Decision Support Systems.' 2023.

personas.name: Healthcare Administrator
personas.description: Administrative role in healthcare with system management and compliance responsibilities
personas.context: Clinical decision support systems threat analysis
personas.fullCitation: Hamel, Laurent. 'Safeguarding Healthcare: A Comprehensive Threat Analysis of Clinical Decision Support Systems.' 2023.

personas.name: Financial Crime Analyst
personas.description: Professional analyzing financial cybercrime using deep learning approaches
personas.fullCitation: Nicholls, Joel. 'Financial cybercrime: A comprehensive survey of deep learning approaches to tackle the evolving financial crime landscape.' 2021.

personas.name: Organization Man
personas.description: Traditional organizational archetype focused on structure and established security practices

personas.name: Innovator
personas.description: Innovation-focused archetype challenging traditional security approaches with new ideas

personas.name: Dementia Patient
personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users

personas.name: Caregiver
personas.description: Care provider supporting dementia patients with technology and privacy considerations

personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users

personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users

personas.category: Demographic Specific Persona of Regular Users
personas.description: Older adult with selective technology adoption and targeted cybersecurity focus
